name: v1_randomword
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool random_word_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Random word generator full of unique, interesting words. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/randomword
API description: API Ninjas Random Word API endpoint. Returns a random word.

type.description: The type of word to return. Possible values are 'noun', 'verb', 'adjective', 'adverb'. Defaults to 'verb'.
